title: Hindu Temple
description: A Hindu temple or mandir; a place of worship for followers of Hinduism. Depicted on most platforms as a red, orange, or golden building with a tall spire.
apple_vendor_description: The Hindu temple emoji on Apple devices is rendered with intricate detail, showcasing a serene architectural style. Its smooth, off-white facade, accented by soft shadows and subtle gradients, evokes a sense of peace and spiritual significance, a hallmark of Apple's realistic 3D design. On Apple devices, this emoji is often used to represent places of worship, cultural heritage, or a feeling of tranquility and devotion.
